text: Yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche te'omloke iyara agate yibora panahara karaiche tara babe te'omlokara kono gunaha na'i, yadi te'omloke takbaraa aralambana karae, imana ane arau satkarma karae. Tara pichata te'omloke takbaraa aralambana karae arau imana ane. Tara pichata te'omloke takbaraa aralambana karae arau ihachana karae. Tente (jani thoraa) allahe muhachinasakalaka pachanda karae
